page.title: 07The Council Chairman
page.content: Councillor Percy Rayner is the Chairman for the year 1985.This is the second time he has been chairman for Tendring.He goes to a function every day, sometimes twice a day.The functions vary from opening a small school fete to having a full-scale council meeting. The Chairman has almost the same job as a Mayor.Tendring does not have a Mayor because it is a district council.Cllr. Percy Rayner also has to wear a chain which he is not allowed to wear in other towns without permission.The chairman's wife also wears a chain which signifies the chairman's consort.It has letters on it which stand for the Tendring Council's consort.
